ygData.subject: Re: Building new weapon skills
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m in about the same boat.  I ve been piercing things with a giant snake fang, but I do indeed need to pierce something tougher than an orc pawn. The bad
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:14 PM 6/10/99 -0700, Doug Donaldson wrote:
>From: Doug Donaldson <doug@...>
>
>I am a 12th level Bard on The Rathe. I now have roughly 65 skill in 1H
>slashing and find myself wanting to explore other weapon types.

I'm in about the same boat. I've been piercing things with a giant snake
fang, but I do indeed need to pierce something tougher than an orc pawn.
The bad news is that for a level or two now a lot of blue creatures have
been pretty scary solo. I find I have to fight in a group that's tough
enough they don't need my better damage so I can practise my weaker skills.
I've got pierce up to 25 or so and still need to work a lot on 1H blunt.

Thrush, presently Butcherblock and Faydark on Veeshan
